game.name: Mayday Protocol
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The plane is going down. The Pilot sees the cockpit but has no idea how to fix it. The Co-Pilots have the manual but can’t see the screen. Talk fast, think faster, and land safely. Only one copy needed. Communicate or crash.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The plane is going down. The Pilot sees the cockpit but has no idea how to fix it. The Co-Pilots have the manual but can’t see the screen. Talk fast, think faster, and land safely. Only one copy needed. Communicate or crash.
